front.sentence: First of all, I'm going to be fucking mate. Second of all, you are in a load of trouble.

back.phonetic: fərst əv ɔl aɪ ɛm goʊɪŋ tɪ bi ˈfəkɪŋ meɪt ˈsɛkənd əv ɔl ju ər ɪn ə loʊd əv ˈtrəbəl

sentence: First of all, I'm going to be fucking mate. Second of all, you are in a load of trouble.
